types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# [[ecoduct]] {{gloss|type of wildlife crossing in the form of a bridge or tunnel, usually covered with foliage and turf, which animals may use to cross roads without the risk of being hit by vehicles}}
types.html:
écoduc m (plural écoducs)

  1. ecoduct (type of wildlife crossing in the form of a bridge or tunnel, usually covered with foliage and turf, which animals may use to cross roads without the risk of being hit by vehicles)

title: écoduc
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /e.kɔ.dyk/
